cosmos.question: I twinkle at night, far up high, a giant ball of burning sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I give off light and heat.
🔥 I am made of hot gases.
☀️ The sun is one of me!

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball that travels around the Sun. I'm where you live, and so much fun! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly made of land and water.
🏠 People, animals, and plants all live here.
🌍 I am the third planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I circle Earth, shining bright, especially on a clear night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases like crescent and full.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🌎 I am Earth's only natural satellite.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, known for my rust. Scientists want to visit, but that's a must first! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Robots have driven around on me.
🏜️ I am very dry and dusty.
🍫 My name is also a candy bar.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet, a giant so grand, with a swirling storm and colorful bands. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have a big red spot.
💨 I am made of mostly gas.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings, made of ice and rock, a stunning sight that will give you a shock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide.
🧊 My rings are made up of countless small pieces.
🪐 I am known as the 'ringed planet'.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. You might see a bear or hunter if you try! What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 Some were named by ancient Greeks.
🐻 The Big Dipper is a part of Ursa Major
✨ They help sailors navigate at night.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, spinning slowly in space, you can put your trust. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our solar system is part of me.
🌀 I can be spiral or elliptical.
🥛 The Milky Way is my name.

cosmos.question: I am a rock from space that falls to Earth. Sometimes I'm big, proving my worth! What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I burn up in the atmosphere as a meteor
☄️ I can create a crater when I land.
🪨 I come from asteroids or comets.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful and beautiful.
✨ Stars form inside of me.
💨 The Orion Nebula is one example.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a bright color. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I am often given as a gift.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.
💧 I need water, too!

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk. Birds build nests in my branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I give shade on a sunny day.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.

plant.question: I am green and grow along the ground. Sometimes people sit on me for a picnic. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 Sheep love to eat me
⚽ I'm often found in parks and gardens
🌱 I need to be cut sometimes!

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm a tasty orange root vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny eats me all the time.
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins.
🐰 I help you see better!

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers, often red or pink. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a symbol of love.
🥀 Be careful of my sharp spikes!
💌 People give me as a romantic gift.

plant.question: I have long, thin green leaves and grow in bunches. People use me to flavor food. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am used in cooking.
🍕 I make pizza taste better.
🇮🇹 I'm often used in Italian food.

plant.question: I am a hard fruit with a green or red skin. I grow on trees and am often eaten as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one!
🩺 An object that keeps the doctor away
🥧 I can be made into a pie.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk and golden kernels. Animals and people like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am used to make popcorn.
🚜 I grow in fields.
🦃 I am often eaten around Thanksgiving.

plant.question: I'm a juicy fruit that grows on a vine. I come in bunches and can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am used to make juice.
🍷 I can be used to make wine (but you're too young for that!).
🧺 You can find me in a fruit basket.

plant.question: I am a plant that lives in the desert and has thick, spiny skin to hold water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in Arizona.
🏜️ I can store water for a long time.
🌵 Be careful not to touch my spines!
